snippet: Mrs. Javits, the wife of Jacob K. Javits, a United States senator from 1957 to 1981, was a bon vivant who once said, “I’m my husband’s wife, and I’m striving to be my own person.”...

headline.main: David Rubinger, 92, Photographer Who Chronicled Israeli History, Dies
headline.print_headline: David Rubinger, Who Captured Israeli History, Dies at 92

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Javits, the wife of Jacob K. Javits, a United States senator from 1957 to 1981, was a bon vivant who once said, “I’m my husband’s wife, and I’m striving to be my own person.”
